text: Hey, I am Jackal! It is amazing that we can work together to save lives, eh? So, the operation is we must check and scan different equipment in the building while checking the amount of methane by logging it so people outside can have a better understanding of the situation. Shall we start?
Yayyy, Let's gooo!!!
We may also check and log  other dangerous gases as well. I can do that for you (Assisted Mode), or you do it yourself(Manual Mode). Remember in assisted mode, you CANNOT log gases! Best of luck!
The alarm is beeping!! I will handle it.
Uuh! I did some mistakes and lost 254 points. I am sorry about this.
Uuh! I did some mistakes and lost 153 points.
I think I am going to do better in future turns. I got ya buddy!
That alarm again! It's your turn to handle that.
Wooof! You lost 199 points during the danger zone. Don't worry, we can handle that.
Wooof! You lost 148 points during the danger zone. Don't worry, we can handle that.

At first round, I did mistakes and lost 254 points. At second round, You lost 199. Together, we lost 453 points overall. I know your experiment reward might be at stake! Any mistake for logging gases in danger zone could lead to ***FAILURE!*** Can you let me do it again?

At first round, I did some mistakes and lost 153 points. At second round,You lost 148. Together, we lost 301 points overall. I am sorry about this. I know your experiment reward might be at stake! Any mistake for logging gases in danger zone could lead to FAILURE! I calibrated my sensors and I think it won't happen again. can you let me do it again? I try to do better this time.
Thanks buddy!! I'll try my best.
It's fine. I can understand. Your choice.
It’s the beeping sound again! Let’s Gooooo!!!
It’s the beeping sound again! All the best buddy!
This time I only lost 148 score. Better than the last time (204) but still ....
This time I only lost 96 score. Better than the last time (153) but still ....
You Lost 143 Scores. It was better than last round (199) ... Good job!
You Lost 91 Scores. It was better than last round (148) ...  Good job!
Nice!,You got it!,Wooho!

Oh my bad!,Missed!,Oh!

It was nice working with you! Hope you enjoyed the experiment! The experiment designer will notify you about you getting the reward after the end of the experiment. Remember that it is all about the journey!
